name: Abandoned Fazbear: R [Full Game]
description:
"Welcome to The Animatronic Storage Facility!!! Well, actually, you're in an old Freddy Fazbear's from 1985, until the actual place gets built."

Survive from 12-6 AM for 5 nights from the animatronics! In the remastered experience of the original Abandoned Fazbear, you now have

  1. Better Textures
  2. Professional Animation
  3. Less Bugs / glitches
  4. More lore / secrets

Based off of Five Nights at Freddy's by Scott Cawthon

How to play:

Bring up "how to play" menu by pressing space.

#fangame #horror #fnaf #survival #pointnclick
